Headline: Westbound #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute near Van Buren/Wacker
ShortDescription: Westbound 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker, Adams, and Clinton due to, a closed bridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker, Adams, and Clinton due to, a closed bridge.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
